useCase.name: Manage Publications in Repository
useCase.description: Allow researchers to manage their publications in the Institutional Repository or CRIS through the DMPTool.

preconditions.precondition: Researcher is logged in to the DMPTool.
Researcher has navigated to the project DMP in the DMPTool.

mainSequence.step: Researcher logs in to the DMPTool.
Researcher navigates to the project DMP.
DMP checks if publication is in the Repo.
DMP links the publication with the DMP record.
Researcher requests a research output report.
DMP fetches all publications linked to DMP.
Repo returns publications data to DMP.
Report generates a report based on the publications.
DMP displays/downloads the report to the Researcher.
